documents.document:
These, are the days of our lives.

I read Silver's blog about school so I decided to write about that. I actually like school for the most part. I just get distracted sometimes. My parents don't really push me in school either so I have to push myself. I wish I knew what college I wanted to go to. I wish I knew what I wanted to be. I want to either be a photographer, a musican(haha, which isn't going to happen. You know when you were little and people use to tell you 'you can be anything you want to be' thats a lie.), or working with kids. Or something completely different because I'm just 15 and I have no idea. I really can't wait to be older. Sorta. I mean, I don't wanna wish my life away. But there's really not much to wish away. I'm starting to think my life sucks, but I know it could be worse and I'm being optimistic about it somewhat. I wish my parents would push me in school. I don't get in trouble for getting an F, my mom just says that she's sure I'm trying harder and it will come up to a D and my dad doesn't talk to me about it usually(surprise!) My dad wants me to join the army or marines or some shit like he did but I doubt that hardcore. I doubt I'd want that but really and truely it is a possiblity. Who knows. My moms just happy that I haven't dropped out and don't plan to. I'm already doing better than her. She got married when she was 15 and had her first child at 17 and went back and got her GED when I was younger. I get scared thinking about the future. I need a plan. I need a damn job. -_-
I'd be just fine not turning 16. No car, and I have to get a job. Yay. This is bullshit, but I guess when I think about it I can't expect to get a car I was just hopeing I would for the longest time. My parents are still paying off medical bills so it's selfish of me to expect a car. But still, this sucks. I want to work at Captain Video. I don't know if theyre hiring and I don't know if I have to be older than 16 and I'd have to have people drop me off all the time. But it's money, and free or discount tanning and videos and shit. It's gonna take forever to save up for a car.

(shoe size=6, dress&shirt size=? idk small)

I'm delusional.
:]

No lies, just love.

It was in the march of the winter
I turned seventeen
That I bought those pills
I thought I would need
And I wrote a letter
To my family
Said it's not your fault
And you've been good to me
Just lately I've been feeling
Like I don't belong
Like the ground's not mine
To walk upon
And I've heard that music
Echo through the house
Where my grandmother drank
By herself
And I sat watching a flower
As it was withering
I was embarrassed by
It's honesty
So I'd prefer to be remembered
As a smiling face
Not this fucking wreck
That's taken it's place

So please forgive what I have done
No, you can't stay mad at the setting sun
We all get tired, I mean, eventually
There is nothing left to do but sleep

But spring came bearing sunlight
Those persuasive rays
So I gave myself
A few more days
My salvation, it came
Quite suddenly
When Justin spoke
Very plainly
He said, "Of course it's your decision
But just so you know
If you decide to leave
Soon I will follow"

I wrote this for a baby
Who has yet to be born
My brother's first child
I hope that womb's not too warm
Because it's cold out here
And it will be quite a shock
To breathe this air
To discover loss
So I'd like to make some changes
Before you arrive
So when your new eyes meet mine
They won't see no lies

Just love
Just love
I will be pure
No, no, I know I will be pure
Like snow
Like gold
Like snow
Like gold

One day I'm gonna lose the war.

I'm babysitting today :] I love little Abbygale she is so precious.
Florida in like 5 days!
I'm feeling optimistic this morning. Yesterday I realized, I complain too much and I have a hell of a lot to be grateful for.
You know, my sister is one of the few people I know I can be crazy around and she will be just as crazy back. It's weird, I use to think that if she wasn't my sister we would never talk to each other, and now I kind of think that if she wasn't my sister we might be friends.
Why, in my dreams do people usually want to kill me, hurt me, pray on my insecurities, die with me, or fuck me.
Weird. I love my dreams though, as strange as they are.
"But my friend, I'd sacrifice all those nights if I could make the Earth and my dreams the same."
I lost two pounds :]
This chick on experienceproject.com sent me a message telling me i shouldnt be trying so hard to lose weight and blah blah blah and shes been there and blah. she said 'please write me back' so i did. Idk, I just have to if someone says it like that, they seem so desperate.
As if I'm fucking stupid. As if I don't know where my proper weight range is. As if I fucking have some sort of goddamn eating disorder.
People are fucking stupid. I was really nice to this chick though. I'm just too nice of a person I guess.
Pool shark by Sublime is an amazing song. I love it. Poor Brad =/ He died of a herion overdose. I use to be so in love with Sublime, I still am I just haven't listened to them lately. But I heard that song yesterday. :] I loove it.
Summer feels like it's going by too fast. :/

Herpes virus killing Coral Reefs?

What the hell.

Herpes viruses are naturally found in many different animals (95 percent of humans carry some kind of herpes virus).
“Everybody in this room has at least a couple herpes viruses running around,” Rohwer said at the symposium, causing some in the audience to chuckle. “And when you get stressed, or immuno-compromised, they’re going to start hopping out and giving you little cold sores or other wounds that we won’t talk about.”

“That seems to be what’s going on in the corals too,” he added.

Rohwer and Therber’s findings suggest that these disease outbreaks are just one of the many ways human activity is killing off corals.

“They’re screwed no matter what we do to them,” Rohwer said.

I've been sleeping so strange at night.

Last night I saw Evan Almighty with some people. I liked it. It was pretty tight. We have to give our ferret away today. :[ Aww, I'm gonna miss the little critter. Anywho last night I realized how crazy I am about people who talk loud or don't turn off their phones when the movies playing. It drives me insane. I hate it more than anything. I don't really know why, but I was thinking about O.J. Simpson eariler. I wish he was in fucking jail. How do people think he's innocent? Who the hell writes a book after being accused of murder saying, if I did murder them this is how I'd do it right here. No sane person does that. It's a fucking confession, why couldn't people tell that?
"The proposed book's cover, as released by HarperCollins, showed a photograph of Simpson with the words "I Did It" in red and the word "If" in white. The red part is much more pronounced, with some taking that as a hint of confession. The white "If" tries to nullify this and give the cover the appearance of fiction."

Yeah I don't know exactly why I even started thinking about it.
But, I'm gonna go make some coffee now.
Bye darlings.
:]

I love this beautiful tragic song.

i had a brother once
he drowned in a bathtub before he had ever learned how to talk
and i don't know what his name was but my mother does
i heard her say it once, padriac my prince i have all but died from the
sheer weight of my shame. you cried but no one came and the water filled your
tiny lungs. appear, my dear, and cry for me. it was six years ago today that
we laid you in your grave, your sweet young skin was shining then too.
and so tonight to celebrate i will poison myself.
another coughing, shaking fit in a bathroom that is spinning.
so i close the door and rest my head on the tile floor,
sickness and sleep turning me cold.
i am still not sure, is there some better place i could be heading towards?
where the selfishly sick and self absorbed are welcome.
i saw the future once.
i was drunk in a phone booth.
my eyes were wet and red but i could not tell what was said
and through the screams of the traffic voices carried saying
i am sorry
on a day so gray its black inside
watching churches on tv
in a coma you don't dream you just hope that someone sits with you
babies turn blue when they are ignored like the sky on summer days
before you turn and walk away it has changed you
so tonight to compensate i will poison myself
another coughing, shaking fit in a bathroom that is spinning.

Another sad attempt at writing :]

I really liked this when I wrote it, but maybe thats because I was half shitfaced. Some changes will probably be made.
6-26-07
Somewhere inbetween the beautiful ceremony
We all started to feel uncomfortable
I'm trying, trying so damn hard
To actually deal with conlict but I can't
So whiskey is a good alternative
Oh, how I love it all
The lights
The singing
The crying
Oh, how much I've wasted my life
I could be so much better
If I only cared enough
And you, my darling
Your so lovely
If only I could rip you apart & dissect you
To find out what makes your beauiful soul tick
In my next lifetime
I'll try harder
I'll remember
& I'll be better
This taste of vomit in my mouth
It reminds me of the good times
& it tells me to keep on trying

You probably don't want to read this poorly structured blog

Unless you like listening to me go on and on and on you won't enjoy reading this blog. :]

Okay so yesterday Kayla got on my nerves because she's pmsing and then she made me get off the phone because she was like i have to go to work tomorrow, I'll get off in 15 minutes because I have to sleep. So I got off the phone. And about an hour later I could get back on it, and then she was talking to mom about florida and she was like me & nick are riding with you and amelia can ride with dad. Fuck that! I rode with dad all the way back home last year and me and dad dont get along and she knows it and she was like yeah well your gonna have to deal with it until i move out(which isnt gonna be till forever because she turns 18 in november but shes said like a thousand times that shes not moving out then. She'll be a senior so she'll probably wait until the school years over and probably move out when next summers over. She was being a bitch. So then I got back on the phone and she came in my room and tried to act like we were fucking best friends so I was like why are you in my room I hate you and she was like because I know you dont really mean that(which I dont but thats not the point) and I was like Oh, really? & I left the room and then a couple seconds later she went back in her room and started complaining to mom about how mean I am. -_- and then I got a lil crunk and she told me to come to her room and i did and she was like I'm sorry I'm on period, I'm satan right now. So I was like its alright, beause when people start apologizing to me I feel like were in the fucking brady bunch or some shit. And then she was like no come here and she kept being all sweet and stuff so I got all sweet back just because I was crunk and I wasn't really mad at her, like not enough to stay mad at her. But I'm seriously not riding with my dad. But we didn't really talk about that anymore.
With my sister, I don't exactly feel like she's my older sister(except for the fact that she can fight and I can't) like I'm more mature than she is, and she isn't really someone that knows when its a good idea to hide your emotions, and not just bring them all out. She's a really emotional person. It makes me feel like I have power over her(sounds weird, I know) but I've always felt that way. She calls me stupid and all this. but she asks me for my advice 24/7 and she always takes my advice, and if she doesn't shes like I wish I took your advice. It makes me feel like I'm the smart older perfect one when she gets all emotional and can't compose herself. That's probably mean, but its nice to feel like your older beautiful likeable sister who makes good grades and has a boyfriend she loves and BOTH parents actually like her, is the one thats the fuck up and your the perfect one. It's nice to feel that if only for a second.
I really do love my sister. I can't imagine my life without her. It would suck a million times more.

At least pretend you didn't wanna get caught.

ew. I just puked my fucking guts out and I don't know why. I feel all dizzy and weak and I get hot and then really cold. I haven't even done any drugs or anything in a few days. This sucks. I guess I'm sick. Maybe thats why I wanted to pass out all day yesterday. I'm cold right now but I'm sweating.
I'm really tired of every guy right now. Almost every guy.
My hands are fucking freezing!
I had a dream last night that I was really really skinny and I cut my hair all short and was really cute.
Actually I kind of looked like Mary-Kate Olsen.
I'm gonna go take like a bottle of headache medicine and probably throw up again because it feels like the vomit keeps trying to come up.
Haha, I know. Too much right?
;]

Tell me what you need and I'll tell you how to be without i

Florida was tight.
I have a tiny little baby turtle, his names Jim Morrison.
We went to the beach and Zooworld and Gulfworld and the Ripleys Believe it or not museum and went fishing and did a bunch of stuff that I don't really feel like naming right now.
Yesterday was my birthday and my mommy bought me an ipod :]
It's pink and its a nano.

<3

Sorry for the bullshit entry, I don't really feel like writing right now.

Ah man don't be a buzzkill, just keep shootin' lunatic.

I'm watching this movie or whatever it is on comedy central right now called Upright Citizens Brigade. Just watching it makes me feel like I'm going insane. It's going off now I think. I haven't felt like writing on this thing lately but I have kind of been writing on livejournal a little bit.
And I still don't feel like writing.
I might later.
Sorry for all the gay entries.

Just schizophrenic, don't panic...

Is there seriously anyone else that gets scared that other people can hear their thoughts?
Sometimes I get scared of that so I scream inside my head to see if the person beside me does anything.

But I've gave up caring about 'am i crazy???' who cares.
If I am schizophrenic, at least I'll never be lonely right?

:]

I want the following:

Chuck Palahniuk books:

Lullaby
Survivor

Choke
Diary
Rant

My mom might put me on antidepressants.
Not trying to complain, but I have been feeling depression a lot lately.
Even when good things happen to me, I still feel depressed.
Not TOO depressed though, I'm fine.

God, this sounds like some little pity thing.
I'm gonna stop here.

Spiderpig spiderpig, does whatever a spiderpig does.

The Simpsons never ever get old.
They are a relief in this harsh, greedy, stupid world.

Anywho, I'm ready for bitches to give me my ipod back and for some antidepressants.

Who else on PAN hates their dad?
Tell me, who?
I promise you my dad is worse.

(I promise you I'm worse than anyone else you'll ever meet.)

Why do I still have friends?
All I've ever done to them is manipulate them and fuck with their emotions.
I'm a manipulative bitch.
Hasn't everyone else realized that yet?

I didn't sleep at all last night.
Insomnia sucks.

Please don't read this anybody.

And if you comment, then prepare to have it over-analyzed.

=P

Ignore that post yesterday.
I'm just crazy right now because I haven't slept in a really long time and people in my family piss me off.

Anyway, I was watching tv earlier and just flipping through channels, and the Tyra Banks show was on and I watched a little bit of it. She's still talking about people calling her fat.
http://homedir-c.libsyn.com/podcasts/16eccc051979d4b5448290e5802217aa/469d170b/girl600/images/tyra_bad_tabloid_anger_pic_fat.jpg

She tells everyone to love their body and not worry about what other people say, btu she's a huge hypocrite.
And, she has women dress up in these red bathing suits with their weight printed on them.
She's trying to make herself feel better. That's all she's fucking doing.

Tyra Banks is a freak show.

Of course most of these women (besides the ones that are supposed to look 'super skinny', and she tries to make people feel sorry for) have a higher weight than her, and if they don't then they are a lot shorter than her so they look fatter than her.

I've seen her show before, I've seen how she brings girls on there that are 'messed up'. She tells them that they're ruinging their lives and she wants them to stop, because even though this particular episode is the only thing that connects Tyra to this 'messed up' girl, she really cares about her.
She wants to make herself feel superior to everyone else.

Don't compromise yourself, you are all you've got.

I feel like I've been trying to gain sympathy. I didn't ever think I was but I complaian so much, now it feels like I am. I really feel like I haven't been myself lately? So what if I have depression, a lot of people have depression. It's just some people whine about it, and some people choose not to let it rule their lives. I didn't use to complain a lot but now I think I am just because I want attention. I'm so stupid. Once I have everyones attention, I never know what to do with it. I use to be simple & carefree & didn't let stupid stuff bother me. I want to be like that again. Maybe I've turned a little cinical, and I kind of like that & I have a lot of insight, but I think I should find that balance between being a strong smart person, and being laid-back and just having fun too. Antidepressants would still be cool though even if I don't need them, because plain and simple, I just like taking pills. And a friend told me(that doesn't have depression) that they make you feel good. Even if this friend is a junkie (like a good percentage of my friends are).
I think I can really be happy now. not fake-happy either, just true happiness.
:]

You done gone up the river and I hope the fuck you can swim.

I haven't worked out for the last few days and I feel lazy but, It's not really from lack of trying.
I've just felt like crap and been really tired and been trying to take care of my sister on top of that. Our scale is broken. I'm gonna get my mom to buy a new one hopefully. You have to estimate. It says I weigh 117 lbs. I don't really though. God, that would be horrible. Last time I checked on a scale I knew worked it said 110, and I feel skinnier since then and I've worked out and not ate like a pig, so hopefully it's less. Well, it will be less I know that.
I've had kind of a rough week. :/
But it's okay because tonight I'm going to go see Transformers with some friends, and tomorrow I'm going to the mall. So I'm happy.
I'm reading Timeline right now, it's not the best book and it's too technical for some, but it's not bad. The movie is whats bad. Jesus, that movie sucks ass. I'm going to try to go to a bookstore or a library and get some new books because all the ones we have besides Timeline I've read a million times.
The only really good books we have are Sophie's World, which Sterling has(I highly doubt she ever read it though.), The Things They Carried, which is amazing, and Haunted, which Chelsea has. Other than that none of them are anything special.
:]
I know someone whose pregnant.
Well I know a lot of people that are pregnant but now I know someone close to me that's pregnant. She's five weeks pregnant, and if it's a girl she might name it Layla.
I think after my sister because they're close too.
I'm gonna go take a cold shower. I hope it helps.

:[

I am so against abortion. I mean, if you got raped and can't take care of it at all I use to kind of think that's okay. But putting it up for adoption is way better than killing it. Especially since there are a lot of unfertile couples that would love to have a baby. I could never do this. I couldn't carry a life inside of me for a while and then decide that I want it killed and afterwards just go on with my life. I would never forgive myself. If you're reading this and you got an abortion for whatever reason, that's fine. I'm not trying to judge you, it's your life.
But if she goes through with this I know it will change the way I look at her entirely.
She needs to think about it longer than 24 hours.

& she's already made an appointment.
:[

God, I wish I was older. I would take care of that baby in a second. I felt like crying all day but I was in public so I didn't want to make a scene or anything. But now I really want to cry.

I haven't cried in so long..

Anywhere I go a fly girl will please me!

Okay, I broke out in hives earlier. I don't know why. It looks a little better now but seriously, ew. I don't think I've ever gotten hives before. Anywho, I'm reading this book I bought yesterday called Hit Parade. It's pretty good. It's not amazing, but it's not bad at all. I like it. It's about a hit man, but most people would probably guess that from the title. I'm supposed to be doing laundry. And I have to take a shower and make myself not look like hell. I always have dark circles under my eyes. I've heard that your supposed to put a spoon on your eye or something, I don't know if that works. I might try it though. I'm tired of looking like a racoon. But I can get ready later because I'm going to a party and it's not like it'll start soon.
I'm starting to wonder if me & Jenna are still friends. I was supposed to call her about a week ago to hang out and I kept putting it off. I don't know why. We always have fun together, so I don't know why I wouldn't want to hang out with her? Maybe I'm just too lazy to call people. That's probably it. I usually just let people call me. I don't really even like phones. I should've bought a scale that works yesterday while I was out buying random shit. I don't know how much I weigh but I know it's still too much. I need more willpower. We have a bunch of vitiman water, and I drink it because it's good for you but the pink kind tastes like shit, but we also have the orange kind and that ones alright.

I'm a dork, I know.

I love this song.

In muddy grass we stand side by side
With our knuckles interlocked
Black dresses flood the cemetery
In this cliche tragedy

Just do as you're instructed and....
Take this razor and cut your palms
I'll do the same until a river of crimson begins to flow
Now drip your ruby red over the casket
A funeral for my once loved youth

My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But in this Bonnie and Clyde kind of romance
Tell me what would you do?
My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But when your precious life is at stake
Tell me would you die for me too?

The quivering liquids in your stomach
Will eat away at the bad habits that have made you
A real character in the story of your now distant life
Goodnight and goodbye, quickly

In gentle greens we stand side by side
With your head buried in my chest
Black veils send me shivering
The fear that part of me is dying

Just do as you're instructed and....
Take this razor and cut your palms
I'll do the same until a river of crimson begins to flow
Now drip your ruby red over the casket
A funeral for my once loved youth

My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But in this Bonnie and Clyde kind of romance
Tell me what would you do?
My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But when your precious life is at stake
Tell me would you die for me too?

The quivering liquids in your stomach
Will eat away at the bad habits that have made you
A real character in the story of your now distant life
Goodnight and goodbye, quickly, quickly

Goodbyes are said and roses thrown
And the crowd starts to weep
But the irony of the story is when I fell to my knees
And began clawing at the dirt in front of the tombstone
Of my bashful childhood
With you by my side, you're screaming at the
Top of your lungs, "let it go"
And I'm screaming at the top of my lungs
"The ceremony was not proper, there was not enough people,
And who picked the music?
Those melodies almost made me physically sick"

My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But in this Bonnie and Clyde kind of romance
Tell me what would you do?
My secret is fatally gorgeous
I'd die for you
But when your precious life is at stake
Tell me would you die for me too?

The quivering liquids in your stomach
Will eat away at the bad habits that have made you
A real character in the story of your now distant life
Goodnight and goodbye, quickly
Goodnight and goodbye, quickly

is a whore!
